ptp:process-type.name: DNA Samples QC

parameter.name: 2.Assign Concentration from Submitted Samples
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (submittedSample.hasValue( ::Sample Conc.:: )) {output.::Concentration:: = submittedSample.::Sample Conc.::}; if (submittedSample.hasValue( ::Sample Conc Units:: )) {output.::Conc. Units::=submittedSample.::Sample Conc Units::} ; if (input.hasValue( ::Concentration:: ) && (input.::Concentration::>0)) {output.::Concentration:: = input.::Concentration::}; if (input.hasValue( ::Conc. Units:: ) && (input.::Concentration::>0)) {output.::Conc. Units:: = input.::Conc. Units::}; ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0} -s false"

parameter.name: 3.Assign QC flags
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (output.::Concentration:: >= step.::Concentration Threshold (ng/uL):: ) {output.QC = true} else {output.QC = false}' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2} -s false"

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

parameter.name: Copy SampleTag
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'output.::Sample Tag:: = input.::Sample Tag:: ; ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

parameter.name: 3. Route by python
parameter.string: bash -c "/usr/bin/python /opt/gls/clarity/customextensions/Common/route_by_template.py -u {username} -p {password} -s {stepURI:v2} -r 'Go To Next Step,False,Affymetrix Axiom Genotyping McGill 1.0,DNA Amplification McGill 1.1\nGo To Next Step,True,Sample Normalization,Sample Normalization Extra Plate' -l {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }

cnf:field.name: Kit
cnf:field.preset: NxSeq AmpFREE Low DNA Library Kit

cnf:field.name: Library Kit Name
cnf:field.preset: NxSeq AmpFREE Low DNA Library Kit

step-property.value: 0/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|1/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|2/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false
step-property.name: autoAttachFiles

step-property.value: 0/{LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|1/{LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|2/{LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|3/{LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false|4/{LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,CSV mapping file,CSV file for manual,KapaTag CSV file for robot }/isAutoAttached=false/locked=false
step-property.name: autoAttachFiles
